marklogic.body: Sweet tooth?! Mine runs from head to toe!! When I was in Weight loss mode I was really great at restricting my sweets to maybe once a week, now that I have my goal weight I have found myself slipping back into the little bit every night mode. I think if you can allow yourself a small amount (my favourite is two squares of Lindt 85% - it's healthy....right?) a few nights a week you are less likely to cave and go wild when you do decide to have a treat. However, I know that when I am feeling down I tend to eat more of everything in general, especially little snacks (oh, the cheese, and the chocolate, and the dried fruit) that really can add up over the day. Those are the times that I need to stop and ask myself why I am eating sugar or treat foods. I am Glad you learnt something out of your challenge, and great job on only having cheats 15 days out of 90!
